name: Alien woman
line: It’s the crowmad!

name: Owl 1
line: Give it a second. Maybe he’s taking it out to surrender.

name: Short alien man
line: He’s anti-heroic, run!

name: Owl 2
line: I don’t understand.

name: Owl 3
line: He’s only one man!

name: Rick
line: With the power of a thousand crows!

name: Owl 3
line: Good luck.

name: Owl 2
line: Crows and owls have always been at war, but why do you care? What’s the point?

name: Rick
line: Here’s two.

name: Morty
line: Haha, yeah, cool.

name: Rick
line: Morty?

name: Morty
line: H-hey man. G-good to see you. Y-you’re like, looking like, into crows. Still.

name: Rick
line: Oh, uh, two crows, you remember Morty. Morty, two crows. It’s good to see you, but give me more of a heads-up.

name: Morty
line: Oh well I-I was just in the neighborhood, i-it wasn’t like—

name: Rick
line: It’s just that the battle for crows is kinda never-ending.

name: Morty
line: Huh. Right. A little pointless then, right? That… came out wrong. S-sounded judgey.

name: Crow-horse
line: Crow-horse. Crow-horse. Crow-horse.

name: Two crows
line: Caw, caw, caw.

name: Morty
line: Okay. It looks like— it looks like they’re leading you to a thing.

name: Rick
line: Take care, Morty.

name: Morty
line: You-you too. U-uh I’m doing good, by the way. Oh, my dad was gonna eat that yogurt you left in the fridge, but I-I told him—

name: Rick
line: Ahem. I’m lookin’ for Crowscare. The scarecrow. The evil scarecrow. Come on, whoever gives him up first lives.

name: Rick
line: Fine, I can kill an extra asshole. Helps me get my steps in.

name: Morty
line: Rick!

name: Rick
line: Morty?

name: Pussifer
line: Wood?!

name: Pussifer
line: Gahhh!

name: Rick
line: Uh, Morty. Why are you now like forty?

name: Morty
line: Th-that’s how long it’s been, Rick.

name: Rick
line: Oh. Um, I guess we can have a drink together then.

name: Morty
line: Do you have a rum and coke?

name: Waiter
line: What are you, twenty?

name: Morty
line: Oh-ho-ho. Bless your heart.

name: Rick
line: Time be going by, don’t she?

name: Morty
line: That’s your reaction to finding out you wasted your entire life?

name: Rick
line: I feel okay.

name: Morty
line: Well-well, what about me?

name: Rick
line: Woah. Excuse us boys, you don’t wanna be here for this.

name: Two crows
line: Caw.

name: Morty
line: I thought if I gave you enough space, you’d outgrow this phase.

name: Waiter
line: Here’s your drink, poser.

name: Morty
line: Dad got sick, you know. Stage four. Heh, you woulda loved it. Summer’s a nurse. Well, pretty much a nurse. Sh-she married a junkie. Rick, come home. While we still got a little time.

name: Rick
line: Morty, what we had wasn’t healthy.

name: Morty
line: And this is? Y-y-you had a thousand adventures with these crows. When are you gonna kill their Big Bad?

name: Rick
line: First off, the will-they kill-they is everything to my guys. And second, fuck you for trying to undermine my happiness.

name: Morty
line: This may be the last time you lay eyes on me!

name: Rick
line: I hope that’s not true, Morty. Because you look like sh-urrp-shit, and this is not how I wanna remember you.

name: Crowscare
line: Now that I have his two crows, nothing will stop me from eliminating Crow Rick!

name: Two crows
line: Caw, caw, caw.

name: Crowscare
line: Don’t defend him to me, I don’t even get what you see in him.

name: Two crows
line: Caw, caw.

name: Crowscare
line: You’re right, we should be enjoying the time we have together.

name: Crowscare
line: Crow Rick!

name: Two crows
line: Caw.

name: Crowscare
line: Oh, I know what this must look like but—

name: Rick
line: Looks like my arch-nemesis Crowscare and my sidekicks planning adventures together.

name: Crowscare
line: You are hardly the victim here. I was adventuring with these two crows before you ever came along.

name: Two crows
line: Caw, caw, caw.

name: Rick
line: What do you mean, ‘using me as a rebound’?

name: Two crows
line: Caw.

name: Rick
line: You feel like I was using you as a rebound too? Well shit, this lost all meaning. Guess it could’ve been worse. At least ‘adventuring’ was just a metaphor for romantic partnership so it’s not a real breakup.

name: Crowscare
line: Speak for yourself. We immensely enjoy each other’s bodies.

name: Rick
line: What?! Eugh, no!

name: Crowscare
line: Sounds like the man’s asking for proof! Let’s show him, fellas!

name: Two crows
line: Caw, caw, caw.

name: Crowscare
line: Ah, aah.

name: Rick
line: I-I asked for zero proof! Zero proof!

name: Rick
line: I’m giving you free will. Yah!

name: Crow-horse
line: Submit to Crow-horse!

name: Rick
line: Whoops.

name: Morty
line: R-rick?

name: Rick
line: Wubba lubba dub dub! I’m back, pal!

name: Jerry
line: Morty, who’s at the door?

name: Rick
line: Wait a minute, I thought you died gruesomely. W-what the hell’s going on here?

name: Morty
line: See, um th-the thing is, uh—

name: Beth
line: Can you please make Morty fourteen again, dad? This is ridiculous.

name: Morty
line: Okay, look, I-I may have used an aging serum to kind of emotionally blackmail you a little.

name: Rick
line: I kinda figured and I totally get it, Morty. I-I’m done with the two crows, like they were super clingy and I’m ready to make this work.

name: Morty
line: Let’s just hit the reset button.

name: Beth
line: Well no, honey, not a reset, okay? Tell your grandpa that you’re worthy of his respect and you wanna be treated differently from now on.

name: Morty
line: I refuse to do that, I’m desperate to get back together.

name: Jerry
line: Just like his old man.

name: Rick
line: Don’t worry honey, that’s just Morty’s middle age talking. He’ll be less codependent once we get more of his life in front of him again.

name: Summer
line: Uh, I’d like him to stay forty so he can keep buying my friends molly. I’d rather throw my vote away than use it to support a flawed system.

name: Morty
line: Can we make our first adventure fixing this? I-I keep thinking about lawn care.

name: Rick
line: Okay buddy, who sold you this shitty aging serum? What did he look like?

name: Morty
line: Just like you. I-I got it from the Citadel.

name: Rick
line: Hot damn! Hitting the ground running with a Citadel episode. See you later, masturbators.

name: Andy
line: Hi! I’m the Citadel’s new mascot, Andy! Because this place wouldn’t be home without Ricks aaand-ey Mortys!

name: Morty
line: Dumb.

name: Rick
line: Oof, what happened to this place?

name: Morty
line: There’s a Morty president now.

name: Rick
line: Ah, that’s cute. They rebuilt, and made it nicer.

name: Morty
line: They made it Glendale.

name: Rick
line: Goddamn you are cantankerous.

name: Morty
line: Even pooping hurts now.

name: Rick
line: Yeah, well, this place is gonna fix you right up.

name: Employee Morty
line: Okay, so… we’ve got a standard Morty that’s been aged to forty.

name: Rick
line: Can you reverse it?

name: Employee Morty
line: Well if you look at it like a bone, what we can do is break his age in two places, remove the middle and graft its ends back together.

name: Morty
line: Th-th-that sounds really violent.

name: Rick
line: It’s not a literal bone, Morty.

name: Morty
line: Oh, Okay.

name: Employee Morty
line: Brace yourself, the process does also break every bone in your body.

name: Morty
line: Wait, ahhhh! Ooh, ow!

name: Toddler Morty 1
line: I like crayons.

name: Toddler Morty 2
line: Girls are gross.

name: Morty
line: I-I-I think I feel like myself again.

name: Rick
line: Eh, you look a little weird. Your skin’s all pink like a baby mouse. Is that normal?

name: Employee Morty
line: Probably. Uh, sign here for storage or disposal of the twenty-six years we removed.

name: Rick
line: Wait, what? I ain’t payin’ to store twenty-six years.

name: Employee Morty
line: Well, then you’re taking it with you.

name: Twenty-Six Year Old Morty
line: I’m almost ready to sell out.

name: Rick
line: Alright, what’s disposal cost?

name: Twenty-Six Year Old Morty
line: S-something unfair’s happening!

name: Deformed Morty
line: There’s no escape! No escape!

name: Twenty-Six Year Old Morty
line: Let me help you, this is not a good look!

name: Rick
line: Oh boy.

name: Morty
line: Hey, they shot me!

name: Police Morty
line: You are seriously hurting the Citadel experience!

name: Deformed Morty
line: Listen to me!

name: Police Morty
line: Drop the gun!

name: Deformed Morty
line: Death is coming for us all, and the Citadel is a weapon of mass destruc—

name: Rick
line: Woof. You’re about to get suspended with pay. Come on, Morty. Let’s get out of here before this gets political.

name: Twenty-Six Year Old Morty
line: U-uh. Was I influential?

name: Morty
line: Yeah, y-you were influential. You had like seven— seven blogs.

name: Twenty-Six Year Old Morty
line: Tight. Uh.

name: Rick
line: Ugh. Too late.

name: Secret Service Rick
line: C-137. President Morty requests you join him for dinner.

name: Morty
line: Woah! S-seriously?

name: Rick
line: You know I destroyed this place?

name: Secret Service Rick
line: You’ve been pardoned for that, sir.

name: Morty
line: Rick, let’s have dinner with the Morty president.

name: Rick
line: Morty, the idea was to get back to simple adventures. The Citadel runs on canon.

name: Morty
line: Okay. I guess things really are going right back to how they were.

name: Rick
line: Fine, I could eat. But the second he reveals he’s evil, we’re gone.

name: Morty
line: I don’t know. Tastes pretty good.

name: Rick
line: Okay, let me know if you start feeling poisony. Good to have you back, buddy.

name: President Morty
line: Sorry I’m late. Never really ends around here.

name: Rick
line: Look at this Morty. They really did make a you the president.

name: President Morty
line: And I hate ‘em every day for it. But wow, Rick C-137. Now that’s a guy to move your schedule around for. Not-not here to blow the place up again, I hope. Ha ha.

name: Rick
line: Ha. Not unless you try to keep me here.

name: President Morty
line: Geez, wouldn’t dream of it. But it’s amazing you dropped by because I was eventually gonna hunt you down.

name: Rick
line: There’s the reveal. Let’s dance.

name: President Morty
line: Ha, geez.

name: Morty
line: Come on, man. The guy got elected president. By Ricks and Mortys. He’s being really nice.

name: Rick
line: All politicians are nice.

name: President Morty
line: He’s a hot bag of peanuts, isn’t he?

name: Morty
line: We’ve been through a lot, a-and he does not like—

name: Rick
line: Serialized drama.

name: President Morty
line: Right, no drama. Keep it episodic. Ricks never look back. Waste of a legend in his case. You know, he practically built this place.

name: Morty
line: Wait, what?

name: Rick
line: And now you're running it squeaky clean, right? That’s why you got deformed Mortys comin’ up through the sewer lines talking about ‘hope’ and ‘change’.

name: President Morty
line: Fair enough.

name: Morty
line: Good clap-back, Rick. What’s the deal with that, Mr. P?

name: President Morty
line: I got a little project going on, acquired some hands-on labor. It would require less if you were willing to tell me how one might bring down the Central Finite Curve.

name: Rick
line: Alright, time to go Morty.

name: Morty
line: I wanna know what he’s talking about.

name: President Morty
line: Yeah, you’ve come all this way. Can you give me ten more seconds?

name: Rick
line: Literally ten? Because now it would be six.

name: President Morty
line: Oh, I’m fine with that. Make it two… one. Like I said, would’ve been a big help for you to tell me, but I should have everything I need from you now. Let me just make sure…

name: Rick
line: You can’t scan an entire brain over appetizers.

name: President Morty
line: Oh, most of yours got scanned a looong time ago.

name: President Morty
line: You probably don’t remember.

name: Rick Stan Lee
line: Check out season one, episode nine, Rickheads. Excel-uurp-cior!

name: Rick
line: Evil Rick.

name: Morty
line: We kicked his ass.

name: President Morty
line: Evil Rick. I love it. Smartest man in the universe, with an ego so big you could just grab it like a joystick.

name: President Morty
line: Looks complete. I was afraid I’d have to kill every Rick on the Citadel to get what I needed.

name: Morty
line: You asshole! I vouched for you! He only came here because I asked him to. I’m sorry, Rick.

name: Rick
line: That apology and a screwdriver in my hand would be worth one screwdriver.

name: President Morty
line: Pfft, you sell-out Mortys kill me. I’d hate you more than the Ricks you worship if there was any point. But you can’t help it; you were bred for it. Wanna see?

name: President Morty
line: You already know rogue Ricks used Mortys to hide themselves from the Citadel. But you might not know it worked so well that the Citadel became its own Morty market. And I’m sure you don’t know how far they’ve gone to help supply meet demand. Sure, Ricks could scour infinity for naturally-occurring grandsons, but why bother? So much work. Such an admission of need. There are infinite versions of our grandfather, Morty. He’s an infinite smear of one shitty old man, and he’s attached to us infinitely through his weakness and our forgiveness. This is why we’re with him. This is why we’re alive.

name: Morty
line: What the fuck?! Rick, say this isn’t true!

name: Rick
line: It isn’t the whole truth.

name: Morty
line: Liar!

name: President Morty
line: Liar.

name: Rick
line: It’s complicated!

name: Morty
line: I’m not busy!

name: Rick
line: Okay, Morty, remember when all I said I needed was your apology and a screwdriver in my hand? Well, I forgot I literally have a screwdriver in my hand. I mean, duh-doi, I’m basically Inspector Gadget.

name: President Morty
line: Uh oh.

name: President Morty
line: It’s okay, he’s free to go. He’s the Rickest Rick. We’ll never see him again.

name: Rick
line: Morty, when you came here for that serum did you refill this gun?

name: Morty
line: Yeah.

name: Morty
line: Holy shit!

name: Rick
line: I only know one man that ever hacked my Portal Gun, and it turned out it was evil you.

name: President Morty
line: Yay. He’s all caught up.

name: Rick
line: Wait! Hold it, hold it!

name: Morty
line: Wh-who’s that?

name: Rick
line: Time for Big Boy. Duck!

name: Morty
line: Does he like it?

name: Rick
line: He’s a metaphor for capitalism, Morty. What do you think?

name: Rick
line: Yoink!

name: President Morty
line: You can’t outrun your past, Rick.

name: President Morty
line: Tch, did you think my forcefield would be down the second time?

name: Rick
line: I was expressing disapproval of your dialogue!

name: President Morty
line: Ahaha. Disapprove all you want. Tonight, the quality of dialogue stops mattering. Tonight, I do that thing I wanna do, with the Curve thing.

name: Loudspeaker system
line: Nobody leave, everybody stay. Nobody leave, everybody stay. Nobody leave, everybody stay.

name: Rick D716
line: In uncertain times like these, I think it’s important for me to say: Eat shit, fuck you! The drug companies paid for me to say every word, I have millions of dollars, and I don’t care— oh god oh fuck no, oh—

name: 'Rick D716-B
line: And I’d just like to say that prescription drugs are great and you should buy them now.

name: Morty
line: What’s happening, Rick?

name: Rick
line: He hacked the entire city’s portal supply. Come on, there still might be one way out of here. Out the bottom.

name: Morty
line: What do you think he needed from your brain?

name: Rick
line: I assume schematics for the Citadel’s Dimensional Drive. If he’s gonna use it to blow the Curve, we do not wanna be here.

name: Morty
line: What is the Central Finite Curve?

name: Rick
line: Q and A after our survival. Hopefully we can snag some untainted fluid at the source and get the fuck outta here.

name: Rick
line: Or not.

name: Rick
line: Wow. I thought my capitalism metaphor was on the nose.

name: Morty
line: So did you help build the Citadel? Did you just lie to me about everything?

name: Rick
line: Can’t you just sneak through the cave base? We turned a new leaf, Morty. We’re back to simple adventures.

name: Morty
line: It’s not a new leaf until you tell me everything.

name: Rick
line: Morty, we really don’t have time for this. The whole place is gonna blow.

name: Morty
line: No, I-I don’t trust you. I-I-I don’t wanna do this anymore if I’m not gonna get straight answers from you.

name: Morty
line: Woah. Dead wife?

name: Rick
line: Yes. Now everyone can shut up about it.

name: Morty
line: Wow, Rick. I feel a lot better having seen all that.

name: President Morty
line: Of course that’s the case. In their minds, they’re the underdog.

name: President Morty
line: And that’s how they justify this.

name: Rick
line: Morty, I’m not responsible for every fucked up Rick out there.

name: President Morty
line: They literally all say that. They all have that excuse; it’s part of their system. None of them have to be responsible, they're all victims of themselves. ‘Oh, it’s so hard to be a genius. Couldn’t you just die?’

name: Morty
line: Well what are you doin’ about it?

name: President Morty
line: Jack shit. I’m leaving. Do you know what the Central Finite Curve is? They built a wall around infinity, separated all the infinite universes from all the infinite universes where he’s the smartest man in the universe. Every version of us has spent every version of all of our lives in one infinite crib, built around an infinite fucking baby.

name: President Morty
line: And I’m leaving it. That’s what makes me ‘evil’, being sick of him. If you’ve ever been sick of him, you’ve been evil too.

name: Morty
line: Rick, did you really leave the crows for me? Or did you come back because they dumped you?

name: President Morty
line: There you go, kid. Now you’re Evil Morty too. Sooner or later, we all are, on this side of the Curve.

name: Orange Afro Rick
line: Don’t worry, Morty. We still got a way out they never thought of. Operation Phoenix.

name: Orange Afro Morty
line: Doesn’t that still mean, like, death?

name: Orange Afro Rick
line: Sure, but the joke’s on them cuz we just found a backdoor to getting off this rock.

name: Female computer voice
line: Rerouted. Rerouted. Rerouted.

name: Female computer voice
line: Rerouted. Rerouted. Rerouted.

name: Morty
line: Oh my fucking god!

name: Rick
line: Come on Morty, we gotta go!

name: Morty
line: Woah!

name: President Morty
line: You can come if you want.

name: President Morty
line: Don’t blame me if you don’t.

name: Rick
line: Ugh. From where I sit, Morty, that’s the best deal on the table. I-I don’t have a real plan.

name: Rick
line: Thanks, pal. I-I’m glad you ignored my advice.

name: President Morty
line: It’s just as well. I lied. That second seat’s a toilet.

name: Morty
line: Oh, super dick move. But weirdly kind of cool to admit it.

name: Rick
line: Geez, you guys really are bred for forgiveness. Let’s go.

name: Rick
line: Say goodbye to the Citadel, fellas.

name: Mr. Poopybutthole
line: Woo-wee. Evil Morty. That was quite a scheme. Makes me wonder if there’s an evil me out there. But I guess, sometimes I look at my life, and I may not even need ‘im. Cuz, well, guess I made a pretty big mess of things myself. Ooo eee.

name: Mr. Poopybutthole
line: I never got my job at the university back. Remember that? Rick made me do karate. It was kinda funny, but I guess things went downhill from there.

name: Mr. Poopybutthole
line: Started isolating myself from Amy. Used to tell her everything I was feeling.

name: Mr. Poopybutthole
line: But then I guess I stopped.

name: Mr. Poopybutthole
line: Cuz I wanted her to love who she thought I was, not who I felt myself becoming.

name: Mr. Poopybutthole
line: Ever think about how horrified the people we love would be if they found out who we truly are? So we just dig ourselves deeper, into our lies every day , ultimately only hurting the people who were brave enough to love us.

name: Mr. Poopybutthole
line: Wish I didn’t do that.

name: Mr. Poopybutthole
line: Wish I was brave enough to love them back. I don’t know, maybe you should try it.

name: Mr. Poopybutthole
line: We don’t have as much time as we think. Ooo eee.
